item.title: ggiraph
item.description: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) df<-Teams%>% filter(yearID == 1980)%>% select(name, HR)%>% arrange(HR) df$name<-factor(df$name, levels = df$name) g<-ggplot() + geom_bar_interactive(data = df, aes(x = name, y = HR, tooltip = HR, data_id = name), stat = "identity", color = "blue", fill = "white") + coord_flip()+ ggtitle("1980 Team Homeruns")+ ylab("Homeruns")+ xlab("Team Name") ggiraph(code = print(g), hover_css = "fill:red;stroke:black") {"
